mapper.select:

,
from answer where ques_id = #{quesId,jdbcType=INTEGER} limit 1
mapper.insert: insert into answer (ans_id, ques_id, user_id, like_num, comment_num, creat_time, edit_time, ans_content) values (#{ansId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{quesId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{likeNum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{commentNum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{creatTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{editTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{ansContent,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR})
